titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for the adiournement of part of Trinitie terme.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: White-Hall the eighteenth day of Iune, in the first yeere of his Maiesties raigne ..
Steele notation: greatly parts 2) or Pursuiuants.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
